Class Combine3Processor<TIn1, TIn2, TIn3, TOut>

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.Processors
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

A processor that combines three inputs into one output.

public class Combine3Processor<TIn1, TIn2, TIn3, TOut> : NodeProcessor, INodeProcessor

TIn2

TIn3

The third input type.

TOut

The output type.
